description: Number of tournament sequences: sequences (a_1, a_2, ..., a_n) with a_1 = 1 such that a_i < a_{i+1} <= 2*a_i for all i.
comments: Also number of Meeussen sequences of length n (see the Cook-Kleber reference).Column 1 of triangle A093729. Also generated by the iteration procedure that constructs triangle A093654. - _Paul D. Hanna_, Apr 14 2004

mathematica: t[n_?Negative, _] = 0; t[0, _] = 1; t[_, 0] = 0; t[n_, k_] /; k <= n :=  t[n, k] = t[n, k-1] - t[n-1, k] + t[n-1, 2k-1] + t[n-1, 2 k]; t[n_, k_] /; k > n :=  t[n, k] =Sum[(-1)^(j-1) Binomial[n+1, j]*t[n, k-j] , {j, 1, n+1}]; Table[t[n, 1], {n, 0, 15} ] (* _Jean-François Alcover_, May 17 2011, after PARI prog. *)
